title: Operation Woo Daisy Ellis
description:
Daisy Ellis isn’t the girl she used to be. After a traumatic event when she was a teenager, she packed up and left her home in Texas, opting to move to a small island town in the Pacific Northwest. Gone is the fun, perky southern belle from high school. Left behind is a shell of her former self, struggling with mental illness and a fear of letting anyone get too close. River Hayes is the closest thing to a celebrity Heather Island will ever get. Former high school football quarterback, he now owns his own construction company. He knows he’s handsome and is no stranger to female attention. So why is it that Daisy Ellis refuses to give him the time of day?Desperate to get closer to the mysterious blonde bombshell with haunted eyes, Hayes proposes a summer bucket list for the both of them. He never expected her to say yes. Adamant that her past has left her too broken for love and relationships, Daisy is convinced she must keep up a wall between her and the sweet, rugged man who never fails to have a smile on his face. Will Hayes be able to convince her to give them a chance? Or will her demons prove to be too much for the both of them? 
Operation Woo Daisy Ellis is a standalone contemporary romance featuring a happy-go-lucky, himbo male lead and a wounded heroine who is trying to move on from her traumatic past. Happily-ever-after guaranteed.
author: Jane E. Wolfe
